t: SCHLAGE BUILDERS HARDWARE CP2-3125-619 Door Knocker, Satin Nickel - Door Knockers - Amazon.com
s: Re-painted my door and updated the hardware- bought this to match. It easily fit into the old holes from the previous doorknocker. Took less than 2 minutes to install since I already had the holes. It does go through the door completely- so the screws show on the interior. I had the same doorknocker in another finish for a million years, so I am used to these showing and it doesn't bother me. A very easy update that looks great. ... My Schlage ...
